distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for wget fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-5953: Fixed a buffer overflow vulnerability which might cause code execution (bsc#1131493).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Buffer overflow in GNU Wget 1.20.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) or may execute an arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
